AT.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
AT.description: Sieben Drachen werden die Apokalypse über uns bringen. Einer nach dem anderen sucht die Erde heim und führt einen Vernichtungsfeldzug gegen die menschliche Rasse. Sobald der 7. Drache in Erscheinung tritt, gibt es keine Hoffnung mehr für die Menschheit, außer du drehst in 7th Dragon Code: VFD die Zeit zurück.

AU.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
AU.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

BG.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
BG.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

BE.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
BE.description: L'apocalypse est présagée par l'arrivée de sept dragons. L'un après l'autre, ils envahirent la Terre et ont depuis commencé le massacre de la race humaine. Une fois les Sept parmi nous, tout espoir pour l'humanité existe en vain... à moins de remonter le temps dans 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

EE.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
EE.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

ES.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
ES.description: La aparición de siete dragones es un presagio del apocalipsis. Uno tras otro se han precipitado a la Tierra y han comenzado a hacer estragos en la raza humana. En cuanto llegue el séptimo, se acabó la esperanza para la humanidad, salvo que tú sepas cómo hacer retroceder el tiempo en 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

FI.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

HU.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

IT.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
IT.description: L'apocalisse viene annunciata dall'apparizione di sette draghi. Una dopo l'altra, queste mostruose creature hanno invaso la terra, seminando distruzione tra la razza umana. All'arrivo del settimo drago, l'umanità non avrà più speranze... A meno che tu non inverta il corso del tempo in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

LT.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD

NO.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

NL.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
NL.description: De apocalyps wordt ingeluid door de verschijning van zeven draken. Eén voor een hebben ze de wereld aangevallen en beginnen de mensheid uit te roeien. Zodra de zevende verschijnt, is alle hoop voor de mensheid verloren... tenzij jij de tijd terugdraait in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

NZ.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
NZ.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

PL.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
PL.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

PT.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
PT.description: O apocalipse é anunciado com a aparição de sete dragões. Um após o outro, os dragões invadiram a terra e começaram a destruir a raça humana. Assim que o sétimo aparecer, acabou-se a esperança da humanidade…. A não ser que voltes atrás no tempo em 7th Dragon Code: VFD.

RU.name: 7th Dragon III Code: VFD
RU.description: Приближение апокалипсиса возвещают семь драконов. Один за другим они нападают на землю, чтобы уничтожить род человеческий. С появлением седьмого дракона всякая надежда на спасение умирает... если только не вернуться во времени назад в 7th Dragon III Code: VFD.

SE.description: The apocalypse is heralded by the appearance of seven dragons. One after another, they have invaded earth and are beginning to ravage the human race. Once the seventh appears, there’s no hope for mankind... unless you turn back time in 7th Dragon Code: VFD.
